java.lang.Object

                           +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLTextField
public class SLTextField
extends ECTextField
Subclass of TextField that applies the stone-texture look.

SLTextField()
creates a stone-look text field with empty bounds
SLTextField(int, int, int, int)
creates a stone-look text field with specified bounds

createLabel(String)
Overridden to use the standard stone look font

SLTextField 
  public SLTextField()
creates a stone-look text field with empty bounds
SLTextField 
  public SLTextField(int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height)
creates a stone-look text field with specified bounds

createLabel 
  public static TextField createLabel(String string)
Overridden to use the standard stone look font
